GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.19 to before v5.4.220
GSD.description:
scsi: libsas: Fix use-after-free bug in smp_execute_task_sg()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 117331a2a5227fb4369c2a1f321d3e3e2e2ef8fe, it was introduced in version v2.6.19 by commit 2908d778ab3e244900c310974e1fc1c69066e450. For more details please see the references link.
